## RemoveFromCartEvent interface

An Remove To Cart Event For tracking users removing items from a cart on an ecommerce site.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface RemoveFromCartEvent 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [category?](./node-tracker.removefromcartevent.category.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The category of the product |
|  [currency?](./node-tracker.removefromcartevent.currency.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The currency of the product |
|  [name?](./node-tracker.removefromcartevent.name.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The name of the product |
|  [quantity](./node-tracker.removefromcartevent.quantity.md) | number | The number removed from the cart |
|  [sku](./node-tracker.removefromcartevent.sku.md) | string | A Product Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) |
|  [unitPrice?](./node-tracker.removefromcartevent.unitprice.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The price of the product |
